message.body: FYI. Some of the things Patricia and that meridian book cover are pretty effective in treatment room. I always try to do the EOV points that apply to the condition. Sp4+pc6 = gold for tons of things.

Thanks Bob. I would love to talk more about those channels and how you use them. I can tell they're special. I opened the du and dai on a friend with lower back pain and she had no back pain for a day but then it came back.
cool that you've been working w them. I have lots to learn about them (im sure a pro may find my use of them pretty rudimentary) but I have immense respect for them.
Me too. Double that! I especially love the four seas. The transporters are more esoteric to me but I love them too.
If your friends pain is in the 6+ range out of ten she needs multiple treatments in a week. Also supplement du w corresponding LU points and yaotongxue? Corresponding Ear spine pts too?
Wish I knew more about when to use the accumulation points of the EOV
Sounds like U are well on your way to success in clinic. Further ahead than I was in jan of second yr
doesn't ea EOV have an accumulation pt? Kd 8 or 9 etc
I'm a total mess! Wood is my first within and water must be my second. I feel like I know next to nothing and its all a crap shoot!

But this feeling is what drives u to be persistent and overcome obstacles. It will make u a better practitioner. The downside is the anxiety and self doubt that may overcome u at times. Perhaps recognizing that it can be a positive will help? Don't for
And don't forget that some say anywhere u put the needle will help...and others say intention is paramount...u can't help but do good if u are present for your patients
And may I add that this is what makes u unique! Embrace it and use it to your advantage! Resistance is futile!!!
You are correct in every way! Sorry I didn't text back. I'm at work and just sent something out that made a million emails to reply back to!!!
Thanks for your texts today. I love how you acknowledge what may seem like my pitfalls as precious strengths.
Yw. I'm sure u would do the same. I think u need to remove that phrase from your vocabulary - "my pitfalls"

Yep you're right! That's why I said what may SEEM like my pitfalls. A fancy workaround. But I was trying to acknowledge that others see aspects of me (or anyone) as purely pointless when I can see the beauty. That's definitely one of my assets. :) How's y
Very good points. I read that too fast. Nice workaround. Look at me giving u advice when you got things pretty much together! Gma not doing super well but Ty for asking.

I still appreciate the support regardless. :) Your advice comes from an understanding of me, which is rare. I will keep you and your grandma and your family in my prayers. It's so good that you are able to be near her when she needs you.
